properties.Script Body:
import org.apache.nifi.flowfile.FlowFile
import org.apache.nifi.processor.io.StreamCallback
import org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Base64
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets

FlowFile flowFile = session.get()
if (!flowFile) return

// Hardcoded SharePoint link
String shareLink = "https://shorthillstech-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/r/personal/yogesh_yadav_shorthills_ai/_layouts/15/Doc.aspx?sourcedoc=%7BD1FC09AE-16FE-4F83-B202-3F87B180360D%7D&file=Employee%20Projects%20Collection%20Form(1-115).xlsx&action=default&mobileredirect=true&DefaultItemOpen=1&ct=1751529317147&wdOrigin=OFFICECOM-WEB.START.EDGEWORTH&cid=e052b3bc-d5fe-4b0f-8ecd-e72a5717fc7c&wdPreviousSessionSrc=HarmonyWeb&wdPreviousSession=4aa2d414-3744-4cca-836a-564ecf4fb6f7"

String base64Encoded = Base64.encodeBase64String(shareLink.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
String graphSafe = base64Encoded
    .replace("/", "_")
    .replace("+", "-")
    .replaceAll("=+\$", "")  // remove trailing '=' safely

flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "sharepoint.encoded", graphSafe)
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)

import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets
import java.net.HttpURLConnection
import java.net.URL

def flowFile = session.get()
if (!flowFile) return

def tenantId = "85a77b6c-a790-4bcf-8fd6-c1f891dd360b"
def clientId = ""
def clientSecret = ""
def scope = "https://graph.microsoft.com/.default"
def url = "https://login.microsoftonline.com/${tenantId}/oauth2/v2.0/token"

def params = [
    "client_id"     : clientId,
    "client_secret" : clientSecret,
    "scope"         : scope,
    "grant_type"    : "client_credentials"
].collect { k, v -> "${URLEncoder.encode(k, "UTF-8")}=${URLEncoder.encode(v, "UTF-8")}" }
 .join("&")

def conn = (HttpURLConnection) new URL(url).openConnection()
conn.setRequestMethod("POST")
conn.setRequestProperty("Content-Type", "application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
conn.setDoOutput(true)
conn.getOutputStream().write(params.getBytes("UTF-8"))

def responseCode = conn.getResponseCode()
def responseStream = (responseCode == 200) ? conn.getInputStream() : conn.getErrorStream()
def responseBody = IOUtils.toString(responseStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)

flowFile = session.write(flowFile, { outputStream ->
    outputStream.write(responseBody.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8))
} as OutputStreamCallback)

flowFile = session.putAttribute(flowFile, "http.status", responseCode.toString())
session.transfer(flowFile, REL_SUCCESS)
